title: The establishment strikes back: 5 takeaways from the Texas primary

author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Kemp Holds Lead over Perdue in Governor's Race; Herschel Walker Dominates Senate Primary

sentence: And as for Stacy Abrams, it's part of that depends on who she's going to face in the TOP primary between Governor Brian Kemp and former Senator David Perdue.
title: The Downballot: We open our mailbag and answer your questions! (transcript)
